page.title: 09CHURCH GRESLEY INFANT SCHOOL
page.content: The school was built in{1877}serving as an{Infant,Junior & Senior}school. In 1962 it changed to a J & I & in l980 became an{Infant}school.In{l984}a {Nursery unit}opened offering 52 full- time places.The children transfer to the Junior School at the age of 7+.The building is old & has a small tarmac play-ground.There are{kitchen & dining facilities across the road.The 8 infant classes work an integrated day & include areas such as art, maths, science, language, music, PE & RE.The children enjoy cookery,using the computer & the library,an annual visit to the theatre,an educational visit & sports day.The school also welcomes a lot of visitors & often supports national charities.The children entertain at Christmas and have class assemblies.Use is made of the local park,leisure centre & sports field.
